definitions.definition: An injury , such as a cut , stab , or tear , to a (usually external) part of the body.
A hurt to a person's feelings , reputation , prospects , etc.
examples: It took a long time to get over the wound of that insult.

definitions.definition: An injury to a person by which the skin is divided or its continuity broken .

main_definition: An injury , such as a cut , stab , or tear , to a (usually external) part of the body.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A hurt to a person's feelings , reputation , prospects , etc.
( criminal law ) An injury to a person by which the skin is divided or its continuity broken .
